channel.title: Accelerators | Microsoft US
channel.description: Accelerators are repeatable solutions that can be quickly and easily implemented for specific business outcomes to accelerate transformation journey.

item.title: Accelerators | Microsoft US
item.description: Accelerators are repeatable solutions that can be quickly and easily implemented for specific business outcomes to accelerate transformation journey.

item.title: ADF Synapse Ingestion Framework
item.description: Speed up migration with ease of development and also use the same for production deployment.

item.description: Azure Data Explorer can provide valuable insights into your IoT workloads.

item.description: Continuous patient monitoring to generate telemetry readings for two IoT consumer devices
